column6: "FOOD FIGHT" PART 2 (OF 3) As Professor Xavier and Magneto cobble together the fragile pieces of the once-proud island nation of Genosha, hostile outside forces attempt to undo all that they have accomplished!
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller:Aaron Lopresti | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | penciller (cover):Andy Park
